author: Darren Allan
title: UK scientists have a smart plan to supply more respirators for coronavirus patients
description: OxVent project aims to scale production of ventilators as required in local areas
content:
A team of engineers and medics from Oxford University and Kings College London are collaborating in a project to test and build respirators that can be produced in university labs and SME workshops, in a bid to help treat coronavirus sufferers.
